meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family, with funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The hemerocallis in our garden bloomed beautifully this morning.
meanings.sent2: I planted a new hemerocallis next to the fence.
meanings.sent3: The hemerocallis seemed to be dancing in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a hemerocallis in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The hemerocallis added a splash of color to the otherwise green garden.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants that includes daylilies.
meanings.sent1: We learned about hemerocallis in our botany class.
meanings.sent2: The hemerocallis genus has many different species.
meanings.sent3: The hemerocallis family reunion was a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, each person is a unique hemerocallis.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of hemerocallis plants never fails to amaze me.
